com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager

类 AssociationUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.LitePalBase
      • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager.Generator
        • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager.AssociationCreator
          • com.jereibaselibrary.db.litepal.tablemanager.AssociationUpdater
  • 直接已知子类:
    Dropper, Upgrader

    public abstract class AssociationUpdater
extends AssociationCreator
    Upgrade the associations between model classes into tables. Creating new tables and adding new foreign key columns are done in AssociationUpdater. So this class just deal with the simple job of removing foreign key columns and dropping dump intermediate join tables.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0

        protected android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase mDb

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AssociationUpdater

        public AssociationUpdater()

    • 方法详细资料

      • createOrUpgradeTable

        protected abstract void createOrUpgradeTable(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                             boolean force)
        Analysis the TableModel by the purpose of subclasses, and generate a SQL to do the intention job. The implementation of this method is totally delegated to the subclasses.
        参数:
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        force - Drop the table first if it already exists.

      • addOrUpdateAssociation

        protected void addOrUpdateAssociation(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                      boolean force)
        AssociationUpdater does two jobs. Removing foreign key columns when two models are not associated anymore, and remove the intermediate join tables when two models are not associated anymore.
        覆盖:
        addOrUpdateAssociation 在类中 AssociationCreator
        参数:
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        force - Drop the table first if it already exists.

      • getForeignKeyColumns

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getForeignKeyColumns(TableModel tableModel)
        This method looks around all the columns in the table, and judge which of them are foreign key columns.
        参数:
        tableModel - Use the TableModel to get table name and columns name to generate SQL.
        返回:
        All the foreign key columns in a list.

      • isForeignKeyColumn

        protected boolean isForeignKeyColumn(TableModel tableModel,
                                     java.lang.String columnName)
        Judge the passed in column is a foreign key column or not. Each column name ends with _id will be considered as foreign key column.
        参数:
        tableModel - Use the TableModel to get table name and columns name to generate SQL.
        columnName - The column to judge.
        返回:
        Return true if it's foreign column, otherwise return false.

      • getTableModelFromDB

        protected TableModel getTableModelFromDB(java.lang.String tableName)
        Look from the database to find a table named same as the table name in table model. Then iterate the columns and types of this table to create a new instance of table model. If there's no such a table in the database, then throw DatabaseGenerateException.
        参数:
        tableName - The table name use to get table model from database.
        返回:
        A table model object with values from database table.
        抛出:
        DatabaseGenerateException

      • dropTables

        protected void dropTables(java.util.List<java.lang.String> dropTableNames,
                          android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Drop the tables by the passing table name.
        参数:
        dropTableNames - The names of the tables that need to drop.
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.

      • removeColumns

        protected void removeColumns(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> removeColumnNames,
                             java.lang.String tableName)
        When some fields are removed from class, the table should synchronize the changes by removing the corresponding columns.
        参数:
        removeColumnNames - The column names that need to remove.
        tableName - The table name to remove columns from.

      • clearCopyInTableSchema

        protected void clearCopyInTableSchema(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tableNames)
        The values in table_schame should be synchronized with the model tables in the database. If a model table is dropped, the corresponding data should be removed from table_schema too.
        参数:
        tableNames - The table names need to remove from table_schema.

      • generateAlterToTempTableSQL

        protected java.lang.String generateAlterToTempTableSQL(java.lang.String tableName)
        Generate a SQL for renaming the table into a temporary table.
        参数:
        tableName - The table name use to alter to temporary table.
        返回:
        SQL to rename table.

      • generateDataMigrationSQL

        protected java.lang.String generateDataMigrationSQL(TableModel tableModel)
        Generate a SQL to do the data migration job to avoid losing data.
        参数:
        tableModel - Which contains table name use to migrate data.
        返回:
        SQL to migrate data.

      • generateDropTempTableSQL

        protected java.lang.String generateDropTempTableSQL(java.lang.String tableName)
        Generate a SQL to drop the temporary table.
        参数:
        tableName - The table name use to drop temporary table.
        返回:
        SQL to drop the temporary table.

      • getTempTableName

        protected java.lang.String getTempTableName(java.lang.String tableName)
        Removing or resizing columns from tables must need a temporary table to store data, and here's the table name.
        参数:
        tableName - The table name use to generate temporary table name.
        返回:
        Temporary table name

      • createOrUpgradeTable

        protected void createOrUpgradeTable(TableModel tableModel,
                                    android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                    boolean force)

      • getCreateTableSQLs

        protected java.lang.String[] getCreateTableSQLs(TableModel tableModel,
                                                android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                                                boolean force)
        When creating a new table, it should always try to drop the same name table if exists. This method create a SQL array for the whole create table job.
        参数:
        tableModel - The table model.
        db - Instance of SQLiteDatabase.
        force - Drop the table first if it already exists.
        返回:
        A SQL array contains drop table if it exists and create new table.

      • generateDropTableSQL

        protected java.lang.String generateDropTableSQL(TableModel tableModel)
        Generate a SQL for dropping table.
        参数:
        tableModel - The table model.
        返回:
        A SQL to drop table.

      • generateCreateTableSQL

        protected java.lang.String generateCreateTableSQL(TableModel tableModel)
        Generate a create table SQL by analyzing the TableModel. Note that it will always generate a SQL with id/_id column in it as primary key, and this id is auto increment as integer. Do not try to assign or modify it.
        参数:
        tableModel - Use the TableModel to get table name and columns name to generate SQL.
        返回:
        A generated create table SQL.
